overview: Mr. Croy has held a variety of senior management roles in high-technology and wireless companies, with responsibilities including executive management of sales, marketing, finance, engineering, information technology and operations. Mr. Croys career portfolio includes experience with Andersen Consulting, Telecom Italia Mobile, Time Warner Cable, McCaw Cellular, AT&T Wireless, and TeleCommunication Systems. Mr Croy is a graduate of the University of Dayton.

image.attribution: Jon Croy, VP Operations at Point Inside
